This change adds better documentation to describe the concepts behind how Normandy works, the mitigations we have in place to prevent compromise, and a specific, detailed example of how to go from nothing to an action being executed by the system add-on. It's intended for multiple audiences, but especailly for security and Firefox QA.

title: Document the concepts behind SHIELD and a full example.
